channel.title: Help with making client?
channel.description: hi all i'm new to making servers and i was wondering if you guys could tell me what i need to make a client... like a certain program? or do i need to be a coder? because i don't know and i don't like clients that other people make..

item.title: Help with making client?
item.dc:creator: @Rune-Nation Rune-Nation
item.description:
@Rune-Nation wrote:

sence you are new as you said your brain is oing to blow up trying to understand all the java codeing. I reccomend if you are new do the basics like make a simple silab server and learn to add shops on a delta source and uderstand everything about that. Then move to a delta source and client and work with that. ina few months of tutorials , snippits and help from moparscape (like im doing so you arent alone) move to something bigger like project insanity. Yes its pre made but for good coders its amazing

Read full topic

item.title: Help with making client?
item.dc:creator: @PvPTurf PvPTurf
item.description:
@PvPTurf wrote:

Thanks man i now know that im a retard lol jk but yeah i really appreciate it
[/quote]

Not a problem.

item.title: Help with making client?
item.dc:creator: @InfiniteSense InfiniteSense
item.description:
@InfiniteSense wrote:

PvPTurf:

None of us MADE an RSPS client. Jagex did. Search in the client downloads and find a blank one, and configure it to work for your source, and modify it with GFX, and customs ( EWW… customs. Also: Add updates. EX: GS stances.) to your heart’s desire.

Thanks man i now know that im a retard lol jk but yeah i really appreciate it

Read full topic
